# Battle of Viluma order of battle

This is the order of battle for the Battle of Viluma, also known as the Battle of Sipe-Sipe, during the Spanish American wars of independence.
| col2header = Patriots
| col1 =
Commander in Chief
* Joaquín de la Pezuela
]]
Officers
* Juan Ramírez Orozco
* Miguel Tacón
Units and Commanders
* Infantry
**  Regiment Primero de Línea del Cuzco; battalions 1º y 2º
**  Regiment Segundo de Línea del Cuzco; battalions 1º y 2º
**  Regiment Tercero de Línea del Cuzco; battalion Fusileros del Centro (Benavente)
**  Battalion Granaderos de la Reserva del Cuzco
**  Battalion Partidarios de infantería ligera del Alto Perú (José Santos de la Hera)
**  Battalion Cazadores del Alto Perú (Pedro Antonio Olañeta)
**  Battalion Fernando VII (Aguilera)
**  Battalion Voluntarios de Castro (José Rodríguez Ballesteros)
* Cavalry
**  Squadron Cazadores Montados del Alto Perú (Guillermo Marquiegui)
**  Squadron Dragones de San Carlos
**  Squadron Escolta del general del Alto Perú
* Artillery
**  22 cannons of 4 or 8 pdr  in 7 batteries.
